amendment.description: To provide the use of the deficit-neutral reserve fund for tax relief for cafeteria plans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4376 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4376 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2078-2080) To provide the use of the deficit-neutral reserve fund for tax relief for cafeteria plans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4376 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4376 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Snowe.
